name: POT
description:
Awaken in an underground lab, far away from sunlight.

You play as POT, the small potted plant. As such, your options are.... limited. 

But, luckily, people don't pay much attention to a potted plant. Jump and hide your way past the scientist to escape the lab. Blend in with your environment to let them walk past you or scale the lights and shelves to avoid them altogether.

Controls:

X: Hide

A D: Move left and right

Space bar: Jump
